about_the_game:
Stained Glass Book

This Stained Glass-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Images designed in the abstract mosaic style art that makes up Stained Glass!

Color images in a new light with this book.

Contents

The Stained Glass book unlocks the following images:
  • Sword Murial - 49x82
  • Cube - 52x72
  • Glass Sword - 56x243
  • Pattern - 60x110
  • Reflections - 64x109
  • Tree - 66x124
  • Abducted - 80x90
  • Sun - 106x208
  • Bluebird - 111x106
  • The Crow - 116x216
  • Lantern - 118x226
  • Bee - 124x124
  • Moon - 127x208
  • Reverence - 140x183
  • Glass Eye - 157x128
  • Broken - 158x208
  • Manor Window - 170x215
  • Rose in Glass - 175x181
  • Lighthouse - 200x200
  • Astronaut - 300x280

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
